combineIndepEvidence

public static double combineIndepEvidence(double priorClassProb,
                                          PR_Evidence e1,
                                          PR_Evidence e2)
Computes P(A|e1,e2) under the assumptions that: e1 is independent with e2 | A, and e1 is independent with e2 | non A. The combined conditional probability is based on priorClassProb and on the precision and recall estimates of the supplied evidences.

                         PR_Evidence e2)
